revised_title: Anatomical Research on the Medulla Oblongata: Structure and Function
tldr: The author conducted extensive research on the structure and function of the medulla oblongata, a crucial part of the brain. They discovered intricate connections and arrangements of white and grey substance, as well as the role of arciform fibers in the brain's function. This research contributes to our understanding of the brain's anatomy and its role in the nervous system.
